Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: We have contracts with two national pharmacy chains and an operational product.  One of the chains is issuing a national press release today to speak about our partnership and us joining together to help the flood victims in Houston and soon FL.  We also have a pharma exec on as an advisor for the token sale. He is leading a webinar, which publicly validates our business model on the token side.

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: Our partnership with Albertsons pharmacy chain has officially kicked off. We've begun it by launching in Houston for the flood victims there.  More here: http://ourtribune.com/hurricane-harvey/randalls-food-markets-partners-with-scriptdrop-to-ensure-patients-affected-by-hurricane-harvey-get-their-prescriptions.html

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: We also have an integration that we are working on with the largest EHR in Latin America. Additionally, an advisor(pharmacist) that is teaching us about the French market to deploy our services there too. Lastly, we're working with a pharmacy chain in Australia to deploy the same service.  The U.S. is the market that we know the best. Over 4 billion prescriptions are dispensed at pharmacies in the U.S. per year.  We know there is value for our blockchain and healthcare use case in other countries. Our goal is to help patients get their medication both easier and more affordably in ALL countries. Author: rowland_shirly
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: sounds like a really big plan. Have you thought about a "plan b" if the token sale doesn't go as planned?

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: We have a decent percentage of the token sale committed. We have interest from hedge funds and VC's that previously wanted to invest in us. From here, it would simply be varying levels of success.  I do agree with you on it being a really big plan. We're of the firm belief that to truly drive change in healthcare and get a steady data flow to a blockchain, you must get the patient involved. Our technology and products will begin to knock down the data silos that exist in healthcare, while driving down the cost for all involved.  To answer your last question directly, we don't have a "plan b"...only a detailed game plan for succeeding in what we're currently doing.

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: https://www.scriptdrop.io/img/scriptdrop-banner.png WEBSITE WHITE PAPER NARRATED PITCH DECK Facebook|Twitter| Slack  https://www.scriptdrop.io/assets/token-profile.png https://www.scriptdrop.io/assets/funding-goal.png  FAQ  How does the Adherence Token work? The Adherence (AHC) Token allows for patients to provision access to their data. It will also be used to allow the patient to buy down their prescription co-pay. The ScriptDrop medication reminder app helps the patient to stay adherent through daily on-time reminders. As the patient interacts, they unlock additional tokens.  Where and how will the ScriptDrop token sale take place? We will give out updates via our email newsletter and blog posts, prior to the token sale.  What will the token launch proceeds be used for? The proceeds will be used to continue the building out of our platform. We have multiple products that help produce the network effect needed to solve the chicken and egg problem that can persist with many healthcare solutions.  MEDIA  https://www.scriptdrop.io/img/press-tc.png | https://www.icoalert.com/wp-content/themes/icoalert/img/logos/logo-home-new.png | https://cryptocoinmastery.com/wp-content/uploads/cropped-cropped-LogoTextWithIcon-1.png

Author: Cult
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: Is this for USA? Entire country or a particular state?  What's the purpose of the token besides giving you money and how will it appreciate in value?  If the token does not appreciate in value there's no purpose for us to buy it, if it does, it's a security and SEC will call you.

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: I've updated the thread with links to our Whitepaper and Project Roadmap. After you read, I'm happy to answer questions you may have.  Our hope is to not only change the crypto world, but healthcare in general. Healthcare needs an innovative blockchain solution.

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: Thanks!  Being able to send data from the pharmacy directly to a smart pillbox certainly makes adherence easier on the patient. A provisional patent has been issued on our data integration with pharmacies for delivery, medication reminders, smart pillbox, and sending data directly to a drone(for delivery). Sorry, Jeff Bezos.  Our data connection is what we use for delivery each day in pharmacies now. It is fully operational.

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: This is for the entire U.S and other countries. Medication adherence is a nuanced issue, that isn't relegated to any one country. We already have an agreement for both our blockchain and token with one of the largest EHR's in Latin America.  The purpose of the token is to incentivize patients to stay adherent to the therapy their doctor has prescribed for them. Non-adherence costs the U.S. Healthcare System hundreds of billions of dollars every year. Our product suite, combined with our token and blockchain solution, can improve adherence while saving both money and human lives.  As the patient interacts with our ecosystem, they earn tokens which can then be used to pay their prescription co-pay.   If the token does not appreciate in value there's no purpose for us to buy it, if it does, it's a security and SEC will call you.  We can never make any promises on token value appreciation. ScriptDrop has retained the best legal counsel in the U.S., in regards to token sales and SEC Regulation. This isn't an area that we take lightly and it has all been properly vetted to not be classified as a security.

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: I'd love to.  Our founding team has a great deal of healthcare experience. We were early employees of a company that sold for $1.1B earlier this year.  What that means for ScriptDrop is we understand healthcare. Our solution can be used by ALL 67,000 pharmacies in the U.S., through a strategic integration, and we're all well aware of HIPAA and the issues to avoid.  We are already building a patient network, through our existing products. That will drive value to our blockchain from day one.  Minimum: $5MM Goal: $17.5M Stretch Goal: $31.9MM

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: We aren't doing an airdrop. We're putting together our bounty campaign now. We're happy to take feedback on what you'd like to see with that.

Author: Mazt rhiezt
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: you say Results will be used to continue the development of your platform. by using products that are able to overcome the problem of chicken and eggs that can survive with many health solutions. the question from me whether you are targeting the chicken breeders or indeed some of your team experienced in the ranch?

Author: darkenedsoul
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: What is going to generate a ROI for being involved in the initial token sale for this project? Is there some bonus to being a token holder that I'm missing? Is the token backed by something, such as profits generated by ScriptDrop?

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: We do have a team that is experienced in healthcare. The "chicken breeding" as you say will be how we're building out the patient network. In healthcare one of the most valuable pieces of data is patient interactions. There's often a gap in both the care of the patient and any pertinent data, after the patient gets their prescription.  We'll be interacting with them through both prescription delivery and our medication reminders. Suddenly that gap in care shrinks by a large margin.  Check out more about our team here.

Author: ScriptDrop
Title: ScriptDrop Token Sale Official Thread and Announcement
Body: As we sign deals with pharmaceutical manufacturers on the medication reminder side of our business, they must buy tokens to interact with their ideal patient profile. They purchase the tokens on an exchange and then give to ScriptDrop to disperse.  For the patient, they can use the tokens to pay for their prescription co-pay at any pharmacy in the U.S.  The pharmacy simply bills the transaction to us and we respond back with a co-pay buy down amount.
